verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: it was disgraceful that these questions were leaked to the media] . but he and his associates were the leakers !
Trump said it [V: was] [ARG2: disgraceful] [ARG1: that these questions were leaked to the media] . but he and his associates were the leakers !
Trump said it was disgraceful that these questions [V: were] leaked to the media . but he and his associates were the leakers !
Trump said it was disgraceful that [ARG1: these questions] were [V: leaked] [ARG2: to the media] . but he and his associates were the leakers !
Trump said it was disgraceful that these questions were leaked to the media . but [ARG1: he and his associates] [V: were] [ARG2: the leakers] !
